caption: Relating to the authority of the Department of Public Safety to act during a state of invasion or imminent danger on the Texas-Mexico border.
undersanding:
Summary:
This bill grants the Texas Department of Public Safety expanded authority during declared states of invasion or imminent danger at the Texas-Mexico border. It focuses on detecting and deterring illegal border crossings, returning illegal aliens to Mexico, enhancing inspection at ports of entry, and combating drug trafficking. Chinese immigrants are not directly impacted unless they attempt to enter Texas illegally through the Mexican border.

中文总结：
该法案在德克萨斯-墨西哥边境被宣布处于入侵或迫在眉睫的危险状态时，赋予德克萨斯公共安全部更大的执法权力。法案主要针对非法越境、将非法入境者遣返墨西哥、加强入境口岸检查以及打击毒品走私。除非中国移民试图从墨西哥边境非法进入德克萨斯，否则不会直接受到影响。
